title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return the indices of the two numbers that add up to the target. Use a hash map to achieve O(n) time complexity.
hints: Use Map for O(1) lookup per element.

title: Reverse String
description: Reverse a string array in-place using two pointers.

title: Valid Anagram
description: Determine if two strings are anagrams using character frequency count.
hints: Use array of size 26 for lowercase letters.

title: Contains Duplicate
description: Check whether an array contains any duplicate values.

title: Maximum Subarray
description: Find maximum sum of a subarray using Kadane's algorithm.
hints: Track running sum and reset when it becomes negative.

title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
description: Merge two sorted linked lists and return the merged sorted list.
hints: Use dummy node for simpler merging.

title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
description: Find max profit from one buy–sell transaction.
hints: Track minimum price seen so far.

title: Single Number
description: Every element appears twice except one — find the unique number.

title: Intersection of Two Arrays II
description: Return the intersection of two arrays, including duplicates.

title: Valid Parentheses
description: Determine if parentheses are valid using a stack.
hints: Push opening brackets; match when encountering closing bracket.
